document_data.name: Sesame
document_data.mainbody: '''Sesame''' was a type of flowering plant on [[Toril]].
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where sesame was known to be cultivated or sold included:
* [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] sold sesame seeds at a price of two [[gold piece]]s per {{SI|1|lbs.|k}}.
* Sesame was known to grow in [[Anauroch]], where it was typically harvested by the [[Bedine]].
* In [[east Faer√ªn]], sesame was known to grow in the [[Greenfields (Old Empires)|Greenfields]] plains.
* In the land of [[Zakhara]], sesame was known to grow on the island of [[Masud Jazayir]]. While folk of the [[High Desert]] made [[sesame bread|bread]] and [[sesame cakes|cakes]] using sesame.
document_data.Usages:
* Sesame trees were often harvested for seeds that could be eaten raw, roasted, or used as a form of [[spices|spice]]. These seeds could also be crushed to produce [[sesame oil]].
* The [[spell]] ''[[passwall]]'' required sesame seeds as a [[material component]].

Notable Users.Groups: * The Bedine tribes of Anauroch were known to place sesame seeds in large mortars, hollowed out from an [[acacia]] tree. They would then crush the seeds with a wooden beam, counter-weighted with stones, by having a [[camel]] haul it around in a circle. The Bedine sold this oil in [[clay]] [[jug]]s for 1 [[sp]].
Notable Users.Regions & Settlements: * In the [[Greenfields (Western Heartlands)|Greenfields]] region of the [[Western Heartlands]], some served [[bagel]]s with sprinklings of sesame seeds.
